title: RDP Load Balance and Redirection Server
author: DaveSchopp
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
Expect the ability to specify the information in the Config that's found in .RDP files, specifically the alternate address, redirection server, workspace ID name, and load balance info, then connect successfully.

## Current Behavior
I can enter the load balance info, not the other information. Connection to the server fails.  A connection window appears and closes immediately.

## Context
Iâ€™m trying to connect to a local server that has the following lines in the .RD...

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet:
